quotes.first-quote: An amazing website with some lovely renderers made by EB. Scroll down below to find out more
quotes.second-quote: I love this website. One of the best. Actually, the best.

content.about: CONTEXT is a 3D studio, founded by myself, Emile, 27. Architect by degree (Sint-Lucas / UA) , (digital) artist by birth (Waregem). After graduating, started working at Infunctievan and Pixelminds. Loved it, obsessively. Forward a couple of years. Evolved from a junior artist to senior. Started freelancing, got a couple of trusty clients. Developed a vision and a pipeline, turned full-time professional freelance. Meet CONTEXT. I love edgy projects and people. If you like my work and want to have a chat, just hit me up anywhere anytime. I render GPU. Emile Broucke Founder / Architect / Digital Artist
content.workflow: All imagery is done in-house. Rendering on the GPU. This means faster results and more room for adjustments. CNTXT does not work with a specific set of revision rounds. Some projects just need more iterations than others. Incorporating our clients in our process, is of paramount importance to us. The more feedback you provide, the better we can fit your needs. Architectural detailling can make great marketing shots. CNTXT develops all models using Autocad, 3dsmax, and renders in Vray. This so we can import close to every format used by todays architecture firms.
content.services: Our focus lies primarily on 3D architectural visualization. Project development â€“ Residential housing - Public architecture Interior â€“ Exterior - Detailing Still images - Animation - VR - Drone images CNTXT also loves catering digital images to product, furniture and event design.
